Tesla shares fall after Morgan Stanley cuts price target on weakening EV demandTesla fell for a third day on Wednesday after a closely watched analyst at Morgan Stanley lowered his price target on the stock, saying that electric-vehicle demand was continuing to weaken in key markets including China despite hefty price cuts. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 17:43:32 GMT第256章https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-shares-fall-after-morgan-stanley-cuts-price-target-weakening-ev-demand-2024-03-06/Akash Sriram, Hyunjoo Jin商业汽车与交通
China's ability to flood EV market concerning to US, energy secretary saysThe United States is concerned about China's ability to flood the electric vehicle market but U.S. incentives can increase the affordability of domestically-made EVs, the U.S. energy secretary said on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 17:38:25 GMT YYAEV2GPKVJLXHA62VXUAS4RHE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-ability-flood-ev-market-concerning-us-energy-secretary-says-2024-03-06/Reuters商业汽车与交通
House lawmaker says US ByteDance investors should urge China to allow TikTok saleA U.S. House Republican leading a legislative push to force China's ByteDance to divest TikTok in the United States or face a ban says American investors should urge China to allow a sale. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 16:45:19 GMT NNFGH3EKK5OCBOWVK4536D3YC4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/house-lawmaker-says-us-bytedance-investors-should-urge-china-allow-tiktok-sa​​le-2024-03-06/David Shepardson技术
India opens new naval base near Maldives amid tense ties and with eye on BeijingIndia on Wednesday opened a new naval base on its Indian Ocean island close to the Maldives, as ties with Male remain tense and New Delhi jostles anew with China for influence in the region. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:23:39 GMT WJJTTU2FM5JFXGR2AFPUZ2D7K4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-opens-new-naval-base-near-maldives-amid-tense-ties-with-eye-beijing-2024-03-06/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
US urges allies to tighten China's access to chip technology, Bloomberg reportsThe U.S. government is urging the Netherlands, Germany, South Korea and Japan to further tighten curbs on China's access to semiconductor technology, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 15:19:29 GMT PN4E2RLXYFOZRCWHJOMJBA2CWM https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-urges-allies-tighten-chinas-access-chip-technology-bloomberg-reports-2024-03-06/Reuters技术
U.S. Senate committee approves bill that could restrict Chinese biotechThe U.S. Senate's homeland security committee voted on Wednesday to move forward a bill that could restrict business with Chinese biotech companies like BGI and WuXi Apptec on national security grounds.
